processSteps.title: How to Automatically Trim Video Silences in Seconds
processSteps.subtitle: From raw clips to a clean timeline ‚Äî here's how AutoTrim works

drop.title: Drop your files
drop.description: Drag & drop your clips. They appear instantly in the queue, ready to go.
drop.alt: Drag and drop video files into AutoTrim interface for automatic silence removal

trim.title: Trim in parallel
trim.description: Hit "Process" and let AutoTrim analyze all files at once. Preview your timeline as soon as a clip is done.
trim.alt: AutoTrim processing multiple video files in parallel with automatic silence detection

export.title: One timeline, all clips
export.description: AutoTrim automatically merges ALL your processed clips into ONE single timeline. Everything is already assembled and ready to edit - just export and go.
export.alt: Single unified timeline export with all clips already assembled in AutoTrim

howItWorks.title: How it Works

step1.title: Step 1: Drop Clips
step1.description: Drag-and-drop your files into the app. No clutter, no mess.

step2.title: Step 2: Let AutoTrim Run
step2.description: Parallel audio analysis automatically trims silences. Customize settings if you want, or just go with the defaults (they're good).

step3.title: Step 3: Import Your Timeline
step3.description: Download one complete XML/FCPXML timeline. Open it in Final Cut, Premiere, or Resolve. Start editing immediately.

howItWorks.conclusion: Done. Go have a coffee, or start your next task. You just got your day back.

testimonials.title: Why Editors Love AutoTrim
testimonials.trustedBy: Trusted by creators and professionals worldwide

0.text: I record 2-3 hour podcast episodes with multiple guests. AutoTrim cuts out all the dead air and awkward pauses automatically. It saves me at least 2 hours of editing per episode. Total game changer for my workflow.

1.text: As an editor, I'm always looking to automate the boring parts. I tried other tools, but none really worked. With AutoTrim, the UX is clean, intuitive, and it does exactly what you want ‚Äî no extra fluff. It saves me at least an hour on every project.

2.text: AutoTrim saves me hours. It makes the whole derushing process lighter, less repetitive, and the speed is shocking ‚Äî I can process gigabytes in seconds. Super intuitive, with previews that help a lot. Highly recommend.

about.title: Who Built AutoTrim?
about.description: AutoTrim was created by Benjamin Code, a professional developer and YouTuber who spent over a decade manually editing videos.
about.quote: "I built AutoTrim because I couldn't afford to waste more time. Now, neither can you."

items.v20: üîú v2.0 ‚Äì On-device AI: filler words & repetitions

0.q: Does AutoTrim work on Mac, Windows, Linux?
0.a: Absolutely. AutoTrim runs everywhere thanks to Rust & Tauri.

1.q: Does it support Final Cut, Premiere, Resolve?
1.a: Yes! AutoTrim exports XML/FCPXML timelines compatible with all these major NLEs.

2.q: Do my files leave my computer?
2.a: Nope. All processing stays safely on your device.

3.q: Can I adjust how precisely AutoTrim cuts?
3.a: Yes, easily customize silence thresholds, minimum silence lengths, and padding times.

4.q: Can I remove filler words & hesitations?
4.a: Yes, this feature is available but still experimental. Results may vary depending on language and diction.

5.q: Can I process multiple clips simultaneously?
5.a: Yes. Parallel processing is built-in from day one.

6.a: Yes! AutoTrim works with both video and audio files. You can even drop video and audio separately ‚Äî if they match, AutoTrim syncs them automatically and exports both aligned in your timeline.

calculation.line3: That's 250 hours returned to you every year.
